title: Combinations of difference, union, and intersection of two classes

blocks.name: inabs
blocks.content: Absorption law for intersection. (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2006.)

blocks.name: dfss4
blocks.content: Subclass defined in terms of class difference. See comments under ~ dfun2 . (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfss4(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0))
} = {
  bitr4i(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  eqeq1i(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0, cin(c1, c0))
  difeqri(hs0, c1, cdif(c1, c0), cin(c1, c0))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  abai(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  iman(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c0))
}

blocks.name: dfun2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of the union of two classes in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables. Along with ~ dfin2 and ~ dfss4 it shows we can express union, intersection, and subset directly in terms of the single "primitive" operation ` \ ` (class difference). (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfun2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, c0, c1, cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
  bitr4i(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))))
  con2bii(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)), wn(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0), c1)
  ioran(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
}

blocks.name: dfin2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of the intersection of two classes in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables. See comments under ~ dfun2 . Another version is given by ~ dfin4 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfin2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, c0, c1, cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1))))
  con2bii(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, c1)
  eldif(cv(hs0), c0, cdif(universe, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
}

blocks.name: difin
blocks.content: Difference with intersection. Theorem 33 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm difin(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdif(c0, cin(c0, c1)), cdif(c0, c1))
} = {
  difeqri(hs0, c0, cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1)), wn(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  pm4.61(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  con2bii(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  3bitr2i(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))
  anclb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  iman(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: dfss5
blocks.content: Alternate definition of subclass relationship: a class ` A ` is a subclass of another class ` B ` iff each element of ` A ` is equal to an element of ` B ` . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfss5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  dfss3(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  clel5(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  andi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c1, c2)

thm undi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
